item.title: Setuping my blog
item.description: Long overdue I don’t know if trully usefull , but it’s a lowkey goal for many programmer to have their own blog to post tutorial , information and opinion on programming. For me i think it’s the third or fourth time since a start to code that i try to create a website for myself. All the previous time i try to create a framework for blogging from scratch in golang or something else.
